TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local forests = 0 local plains = 0
local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_FOREST ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() forests = filter:CountStopAt( 1 )
filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_PLAINS ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() plains = filter:CountStopAt( 1 )
if TriggerObject() ~= nil and forests < 1 and plains < 1 then TriggerObject():ComesIntoPlayTapped() end
